abstract: Kentucky Derby and Preakness Stakes winner California Chrome is named horse of the year at Eclipse awards and wins 3-year-old male category.
lead_paragraph: California Chrome, the winner of the Kentucky Derby and the Preakness Stakes last year, picked up two Eclipse Awards, including horse of the year.
snippet: California Chrome, the winner of the Kentucky Derby and the Preakness Stakes last year, picked up two Eclipse Awards, including horse of the year.

headline.main: California Chrome Is Named Horse of the Year
